abstract.p: Roundup of recent advertising account changes (S)

block.p: Andrew Jergens Co., Cincinnati, part of the Kao Corp., to the Bozell Group, New York, part of True North Communications, as creative agency of record for the Ban line of antiperspirants and deodorants, a brand Jergens recently acquired from Chattem Inc. Billings were estimated at $10 million to $12 million.

CyberSource Corp., Mountain View, Calif., which provides Internet transaction services, to Halloran Robertson & Associates, San Jose, Calif., as its agency of record, handling tasks that had been at the Salt Lake City office of MarchFirst. Billings were estimated at $3 million to $5 million.
